explains: n. 不和，分歧；摩擦；摩擦力
wordGroup: friction factor 摩擦因子；摩擦率
coefficient of friction 摩擦系数；磨擦系数
dry friction [物]干摩擦；库伦摩擦
skin friction 表面摩擦（表皮摩擦机壳与空气的摩擦力）
friction torque 摩擦力矩；摩擦转矩；摩擦扭矩
static friction 静摩擦；干摩擦；库仑摩擦

sentences.en: The pistons are graphite-coated to reduce friction.
sentences.cn: 活塞表面涂有石墨以减少摩擦。

sentences.en: Sara sensed that there had been friction between her children.
sentences.cn: 萨拉感觉到她的孩子们中间出现了摩擦。

sentences.en: Friction between moving parts had caused the engine to overheat.
sentences.cn: 活动部件的摩擦使发动机过热。
